title: Challenge-Based Mathematics Innovation Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical knowledge and experience applying it to work
context.additional_context: Collaborative learning environments for practical problem-solving

learning_goals: They can systematically derive and propose solutions to mathematical problems encountered in real-world work environments as challenging tasks.
They can innovatively design mathematical approaches by integrating design thinking processes and experiential learning techniques.
They can collaboratively analyze complex mathematical problems from multiple perspectives with practitioners across various fields and derive actionable solutions.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
